div.style: display: flex; width: auto; height: auto; justify-content: center; align-items: center; margin-top: 13px; flex-direction: column

label.style: overflow: hidden; align-self: center; position: relative; max-width: 182px; font-weight: bold; text-overflow: ellipsis; line-height: 28px; color: @Color_Text_L1; font-size: 34px; text-align: center; text-stroke: 2px @Color_BG_L2; line-clamp: 2
